snippet: Nearly a dozen of Faith Ringgold’s better-known story quilts are on view at ACA Galleries, along with some of her paintings from the 1960s.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews exhibit Faith Ringgold's America: Early Works and Story Quilts at ACA Galleries.
lead_paragraph: Nearly a dozen of Faith Ringgold’s better-known story quilts are on view at ACA Galleries, along with some of her paintings from the 1960s.

headline.seo: FAITH RINGGOLD: ‘Faith Ringgold’s America: Early Works and Story Quilts’
headline.main: ‘Faith Ringgold’s America: Early Works and Story Quilts’
headline.print_headline: Faith Ringgold: ‘Faith Ringgold’s America: Early Works and Story Quilts’
